user.title: Pair Kiosker App
user.description: Enable the API in Kiosker settings to pair with Home Assistant.

data_description.api_token: The API token for the Kiosker App. This can be generated in the app API settings.
data_description.host: The hostname or IP address of the device running the Kiosker App
data_description.port: The port on which the Kiosker App is running. Default is 8081.
data_description.ssl: Connect to the Kiosker App using HTTPS. The Kiosker API has to be configured for SSL.
data_description.ssl_verify: Verify SSL certificate. Enable for valid certificates only.
